Class SingleEnsembleERTQPlanner

    IPlanner

    public class SingleEnsembleERTQPlanner
extends APSRPlanner
    Class for planning with fitted q and single ensemble.

    William Hamilton

    • Constructor Detail

      • SingleEnsembleERTQPlanner

        public SingleEnsembleERTQPlanner(APSR psr,
                         TrainingDataSet data)
        Constructs fittedQ from PSR and DataSet.
        Parameters:
        psr - The predictive state representation used in planning.
        data - The DataSet used.
        type - Type of ERT ensemble(s). Either "ActionEnsembles" or "SingleEnsemble." In the SingleEnsemble case actions are treated as features, and in the ActionEnsemble case separates ensembles are built for each action.

    • Method Detail

      • learnQFunction

        public IQFunction learnQFunction(TrainingDataSet data,
                        int runs,
                        int iterations,
                        int k,
                        int nMin,
                        int treesPerEnsemble,
                        double pDiscount)
        Description copied from class: APSRPlanner
        Returns a QFunction learned using specified PSR, DataSet and tree ensemble parameters.
        Specified by:
        learnQFunction in class APSRPlanner
        runs - Number of training runs to use when collecting intial data.
        iterations - Number of iterations to use when training trees.
        k - Number of trees per ensemble.
        nMin - Number of splits to create at each inner node. If k is null, then sqrt(number of attribute) will be used.
        treesPerEnsemble - Specifies when trees stop growing if |set| < nMin at leaf, growing stops.
        pDiscount - the discount factor.
        Returns:
        Q function policy

      • learnQFunctionHelper

        public SingleEnsembleQFunction learnQFunctionHelper(int runs,
                                           int iterations,
                                           int treesPerEnsemble,
                                           int k,
                                           int nMin)
        Returns an SingleEnsembleQFunction learned using specified PSR, DataSet, and tree ensemble parameters.
        Parameters:
        runs - Number of training runs to use when collecting initial data.
        iterations - Number of iterations to use when training trees.
        treesPerEnsemble - Number of trees per ensemble.
        k - Number of splits to create at each inner node. If k is null, then sqrt(number of attribute) will be used.
        nMin - Specifies when trees stop growing if |set| < nMin at leaf, growing stops.
        Returns:
